languages.text: {n}Помрачнев, Арджента печально произносит:{/n} "Ты... прав{mf||а}. Жизнь {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} слишком ценна, чтобы ставить ее на кон в авантюре. Но я скорблю, что спасать ее нам придется столь недостойным образом".

traits.locale_text: {n}Помрачнев, Арджента печально произносит:{/n} "Ты... прав{mf||а}. Жизнь {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} слишком ценна, чтобы ставить ее на кон в авантюре. Но я скорблю, что спасать ее нам придется столь недостойным образом".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens, and she says mournfully,{/n} "You... are right. A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s life is too precious to gamble away. And yet I grieve that we have to save it by such ignoble means."
languages.original_text: {n}Помрачнев, Арджента печально произносит:{/n} "Ты... прав{mf||а}. Жизнь {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} слишком ценна, чтобы ставить ее на кон в авантюре. Но я скорблю, что спасать ее нам придется столь недостойным образом".

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens, and she says mournfully,{/n} "You... are right. A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s life is too precious to gamble away. And yet I grieve that we have to save it by such ignoble means."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔的表情变得黯淡下来，她哀伤地开了口。{/n}“你……说得没错，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的生命实在是太宝贵了，不能用来冒险。但我依然为此感到悲哀，因为我们不得不采取如此卑劣的手段。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens, and she says mournfully,{/n} "You... are right. A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s life is too precious to gamble away. And yet I grieve that we have to save it by such ignoble means."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔的表情变得黯淡下来，她哀伤地开了口。{/n}“你……说得没错，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的生命实在是太宝贵了，不能用来冒险。但我依然为此感到悲哀，因为我们不得不采取如此卑劣的手段。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタの表情は暗くなり、悲しげに言った。{/n}「確かに…あなたの言うとおりだ。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の命は不確かな可能性に賭けるものではない。しかし、このような不名誉な手段を取らなければならないことが残念だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens, and she says mournfully,{/n} "You... are right. A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s life is too precious to gamble away. And yet I grieve that we have to save it by such ignoble means."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタの表情は暗くなり、悲しげに言った。{/n}「確かに…あなたの言うとおりだ。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の命は不確かな可能性に賭けるものではない。しかし、このような不名誉な手段を取らなければならないことが残念だ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}La expresión de Argenta se oscurece y declara con tristeza:{/n} «Tiene... tiene razón. La vida de un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} es demasiado valiosa como para jugársela así. Aun así, lamento que tengamos que salvarla por medios tan innobles».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens, and she says mournfully,{/n} "You... are right. A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s life is too precious to gamble away. And yet I grieve that we have to save it by such ignoble means."

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión de Argenta se oscurece y declara con tristeza:{/n} «Tiene... tiene razón. La vida de un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} es demasiado valiosa como para jugársela así. Aun así, lamento que tengamos que salvarla por medios tan innobles».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens, and she says mournfully,{/n} "You... are right. A Rogue Trader's life is too precious to gamble away. And yet I grieve that we have to save it by such ignoble means."

languages.text: {n}Le visage d'Argenta s'assombrit.{/n} « Vous... avez raison, {n}admet-elle sur un ton lugubre.{/n} Nous ne pouvons pas nous permettre de jouer avec la vie d'{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}{/g}. Je regrette néanmoins de devoir recourir à de telles extrémités pour la préserver. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens, and she says mournfully,{/n} "You... are right. A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s life is too precious to gamble away. And yet I grieve that we have to save it by such ignoble means."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage d'Argenta s'assombrit.{/n} « Vous... avez raison, {n}admet-elle sur un ton lugubre.{/n} Nous ne pouvons pas nous permettre de jouer avec la vie d'{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}{/g}. Je regrette néanmoins de devoir recourir à de telles extrémités pour la préserver. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argentas Miene verfinstert sich, und sie sagt traurig:{/n} "Ihr ... habt recht. Das Leben {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin}{/g} ist zu wertvoll, um verspielt zu werden. Und dennoch bekümmert es mich, dass wir es auf so unehrenhafte Weise retten müssen."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens, and she says mournfully,{/n} "You... are right. A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s life is too precious to gamble away. And yet I grieve that we have to save it by such ignoble means."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argentas Miene verfinstert sich, und sie sagt traurig:{/n} "Ihr ... habt recht. Das Leben {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} ist zu wertvoll, um verspielt zu werden. Und dennoch bekümmert es mich, dass wir es auf so unehrenhafte Weise retten müssen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta'nın yüzüne bir karartı düşüyor, kederle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Haklısın... Bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'in{/g} hayatıyla kumar oynanmaz. Yine de böyle aşağılık yöntemlere başvurduğumuz için üzülüyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens, and she says mournfully,{/n} "You... are right. A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s life is too precious to gamble away. And yet I grieve that we have to save it by such ignoble means."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta'nın yüzüne bir karartı düşüyor, kederle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Haklısın... Bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'in hayatıyla kumar oynanmaz. Yine de böyle aşağılık yöntemler kullanmak zorunda kaldığımız için üzülüyorum."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
